definitions.definition: a person who is not involved with a particular group of people or organization or who does not live in a particular place:
examples: Outsiders have a glamorized idea of what it is like to work in Hollywood.

definitions.definition: a person who is not liked or accepted as a member of a particular group, organization, or society and who feels different from those people who are accepted as members:
examples: As a child he was very much an outsider, never participating in the games other children played.
